Students

There are currently three programs that assist current students, recent graduates, and those with an advanced degree:

  1. Internship Program for current students.
  2. Recent Graduates Program for those who have graduated within the past 2 years.
  3. Presidential Management Fellows (PMF) Program for those with an advanced degree.

To learn more, please consult the following resources:

  • Pathways
  • Presidental Management Fellows (PMF) Program
